text.text:
*What would you like to do?* Poll by <https://netsuite-gbu.slack.com/archives/DE6QNFF60|RyMo>
React with an emoji to give your vote.

:one: *This option is really cool*
It's the best option if you like to have fun.

:two: *This option is best for groups*
I hope you like your teammates.

:three: *This option is stupid*
Seriously - you're wasting your time.
